pkgmetadata.longdescription: Desura is a gaming client that allows users to one click download and install games and game modification. For more information, visit http://www.moddb.com/groups/desura/forum/thread/open-sourcing-desura
pkgmetadata.use: add support for 32bit games in desurium <flag name="bundled-wxgtk>build own wxGTK+-2.9.3 (recommended) enable desurium flash support RUNTIME USE FLAG install known dependencies of games in desura install useful tools e.g. uploader
